addSlide.description: Add a new slide to an existing presentation.

props.name: slide_context
props.description: The content or topic for the slide to be generated.

props.name: additionalInstructions
props.description: Extra instructions for how the slide should be generated.

props.name: slide_order
props.description: The position to insert the new slide (e.g., "0" for the first slide, "end" to add at the end).

props.name: includeAiImages
props.description: Whether to include AI-generated images in the slide.

props.name: imageStyle
props.description: The style for AI-generated images.

deletePresentation.description: Delete a presentation by its ID.

props.name: presentationId
props.description: The ID of the presentation to delete.

exportPresentation.description: Export a presentation in the specified formats.

props.name: presentationId
props.description: The ID of the presentation to export.

props.name: exportFormats
props.description: Formats to export the presentation in.

props.name: waitForCompletion
props.description: Wait for the presentation generation to complete before returning.

props.name: maxWaitTime
props.description: Maximum time to wait for completion (default 300 seconds / 5 minutes).

generatePresentation.description: Create a new AI-generated presentation from text.

props.name: inputText
props.description: The text content to generate a presentation from.

props.name: additionalInstructions
props.description: Extra instructions for how the presentation should be generated.

props.name: exportFormats
props.description: Formats to export the presentation in after generation.

props.name: title
props.description: A title for the presentation. If not provided, one will be generated.

props.name: themeId
props.description: The ID of the presentation theme to use. If not provided, a default theme will be applied.

props.name: tone
props.description: The tone of voice for the presentation content.

props.name: contentMode
props.description: How the input text should be handled.

props.name: amountMode
props.description: The amount of text to include per slide.

props.name: includeAiImages
props.description: Whether to include AI-generated images in the presentation.

props.name: imageStyle
props.description: The style for AI-generated images.

props.name: waitForCompletion
props.description: Wait for the presentation generation to complete before returning.

props.name: maxWaitTime
props.description: Maximum time to wait for completion (default 300 seconds / 5 minutes).

getGeneration.description: Fetch the status and result of a generation job.

props.name: generationId
props.description: The ID of the generation job (from the "Generate Presentation" action).
